name: SKMutablePayment
desc: A mutable request to the App Store to process payment for additional functionality offered by your app.

items.name: var productIdentifier: String
items.desc: A string that identifies a product that can be purchased from within your app.

items.name: var quantity: Int
items.desc: The number of items the user wants to purchase.

items.name: var applicationUsername: String?
items.desc: A string that associates the payment transaction with a user on your service.

items.name: var simulatesAskToBuyInSandbox: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that produces an “ask to buy” flow for this payment in the sandbox.

items.name: var paymentDiscount: SKPaymentDiscount?
items.desc: The details of the discount offer to apply to the payment.
